entry.title: Sushi Expands to Aptos in 'Milestone' Move
entry.summary: The move to Aptos is the first time DEX has been accessible on a blockchain that is not compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine.

entry.title: FTX Looks to Offload Billions in Crypto: Here’s What it Means
entry.summary: The defunct crypto exchange is seeking regulatory approval to liquidate $3.4 billion worth of crypto assets.

entry.title: ApeCoin Plunges to New Low, Down 42% Over Last Month
entry.summary: Prices for Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs stopped slipping lately, but the project's associated Ethereum NFT token ApeCoin is still falling.

entry.title: FTX's $3.4 Billion Crypto Portfolio Includes Solana, Bitcoin and Ethereum
entry.summary: FTX's liquid crypto portfolio is worth $3.4 billion in total.

entry.title: Animoca Brands Raises $20M to Pursue ‘Single Native Web3 Project’ Mocaverse
entry.summary: A set of 8,888 NFTs will provide holders access to the company’s ecosystem and a chance to accumulate loyalty points.

entry.title: Ethereum Turns Inflationary as Gas Fees Plummet to 2023 Lows
entry.summary: On-chain traders are waiting for the next narrative as interest in meme coin and Telegram bot trading cool off.

entry.title: Ex-Algorand Boss Steve Kokinos Tapped as CEO for Firm Buying Celsius
entry.summary: Celsius creditors played a prominent role in selecting the board for Fahrenheit Holdings—appointing six of the nine members.

entry.title: Feds Want $5.2 Million in Bitcoin Returned by Teen Hacker—And A Sports Car, Too
entry.summary: The Department of Justice accused the teenager and his accomplices of stealing money from crypto executives in the Silicon Valley area.

entry.title: Hacker Steals Over $690,000 After Hijacking Vitalik Buterin's Twitter Account
entry.summary: A fake link promising an exclusive NFT was posted to the Ethereum inventor's feed.

entry.title: Shaq Got Nearly $750,000 From FTX Amid Millions In Celebrity Deals
entry.summary: A bankruptcy filing names names: Shaquille O’Neal, Naomi Osaka, David Ortiz, and Trevor Lawrence.

entry.title: SBF Lawyers Again Ask for Pre-Trial Release Because Prison Internet Sucks
entry.summary: Disgraced CEO Sam Bankman-Fried doesn’t have enough time to review the documents in his case, his attorneys claim.

entry.title: Prime Trust Bankruptcy Exposes ‘Widespread’ Self-Custody Risks, Says Anchorage Digital Co-Founder
entry.summary: Diogo Monica says applying existing bank rules, not creating new regulations, can ensure business continuity.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Bankman-Fried Roughs it in Brooklyn Jail
entry.summary: According to a prison informant, the former billionaire linked up with a gang from Manhattan.

entry.title: Ted Cruz Says He Is a ‘Big Believer’ In Bitcoin Mining
entry.summary: Appearing on Fox News Radio, the Texas senator said Bitcoin mining is good for his state’s stressed power grid.

entry.title: SEC Responds to Ripple Filing, Doubles Down on Appeal Bid
entry.summary: The regulator claims judge's summary judgment order raises "knotty legal problems" worthy of appellate review

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Green Candles—But Barely—for Bitcoin and Ethereum as Global Adoption Grows
entry.summary: Also, a member of the European Central Bank’s executive board criticized PayPal USD and shilled the digital euro.

entry.title: Ripple to Acquire Crypto Custodian Fortress Trust
entry.summary: Fortress was founded two years ago by former Prime Trust CEO Scott Purcell.

entry.title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Mario and friends enter the fantastical Flower Kingdom. But what else is new in Super Mario Bros. Wonder on Nintendo Switch?

entry.title: ChatGPT Plus vs Claude Pro: Choose The Best Paid AI Chatbot For You
entry.summary: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Plus and Anthropic’s Claude Pro come at similar price points, but they have very different strengths and weaknesses.

entry.title: Fed's Michael Barr: No Word on CBDC and 'Deeply Concerned' About Stablecoins
entry.summary: He also said that the central bank was "a long way" from any decision on issuing a CBDC.

entry.title: 'Harry Potter' Actors Protest London Dream Home Plans of Ripple Exec
entry.summary: Emma Thompson, Imelda Staunton, and Jim Broadbent appear to be seriously aggrieved about their crypto executive neighbor's remodeling plans.

entry.title: Bitcoin Donation Company Says Gifted Crypto Should Require Less Paperwork
entry.summary: It's ridiculous to require an appraisal of donations made in dollar-pegged stablecoins, like USDC or USDT, the company argues.

entry.title: LBRY Will Appeal 'Unjust and Incorrect' SEC Lawsuit Ruling, Says CEO
entry.summary: The company had previously said it plans to wind down operations and the SEC dropped its financial penalty from $44 million to around $111,000.

entry.title: France Now Has Crypto Influencer Training to Encourage Paid Ad Disclosures
entry.summary: France requires investment communications to be non-misleading and balanced. “It appears that some influencers are unaware of this," said an official.

entry.title: Roblox Is Finally Coming to PlayStation This Year
entry.summary: Roblox, which hosts a wide variety of different metaverse game experiences, is finally releasing on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 consoles in October.

entry.title: El Salvador's Bitcoin Curriculum Will Teach Students the 'Dark Side of Fiat'
entry.summary: Students learn about currency debasement, a nod to Saifedean Ammous's "The Bitcoin Standard" book. But he didn't help write the curriculum.

entry.title: RIP TCG: How Deadfellaz Is Rethinking Card-Battler Games
entry.summary: Deadfellaz founders Psych and Betty share how the digital trading card game will help grow the lore of the zombie-themed Ethereum NFT brand.

entry.title: Binance NFT Marketplace Ends Support for Polygon in Effort to ‘Streamline'
entry.summary: Users have until the end of the year to withdraw their Polygon NFTs from the exchange's NFT Marketplace.

entry.title: Review: Should You Spend $20 per Month for the Claude Pro AI Chatbot?
entry.summary: Don’t pull out your credit card just yet. Here’s a guide to help you decide whether upgrading to Anthropic's Claude Pro is the right move for you.

entry.title: How This African Non-Profit Is Building an Army of Bitcoin Devs
entry.summary: The newly renamed Btrust Builders has placed developers with SphinxChat, Galoy, Bitnob, Chaincode Labs, HeartBit, Ibex, and Rigly.

entry.title: Only Up Developer Removes Hit Game From Steam Citing 'Stress'
entry.summary: Only Up is now gone forever, apparently, just months after hitting it big with Twitch streamers and intriguing crypto fans with NFT art.

entry.title: Binance CEO Brushes Off 'Negative News' Amid Executive Departures
entry.summary: In a Twitter post, Changpeng ‘CZ’ Zhao confronted “FUD” surrounding employee turnover at the crypto exchange.

entry.title: Thodex CEO Gets 11,000-Year Jail Sentence Over $2B Crypto Exchange Collapse
entry.summary: Once the biggest crypto exchange in Turkey, Thodex collapsed in 2021, leaving 400,000 users without access to their crypto deposits.

entry.title: CFTC Charges Three DeFi Protocols With Violating AML Rules, Operating Without Licenses
entry.summary: Decentralized exchanges Opyn, ZeroEx and Deridex settled with the CFTC on charges that included failing to geoblock U.S. users.

entry.title: Nearly Half Of Institutions Are Holding Digital Assets For Clients: Report
entry.summary: Of 60 institutions surveyed in the U.S., Europe and the U.K., an astounding 48% reported currently managing digital assets for their clients.

entry.title: Drake and The Weeknd AI Song Went Viral—Could It Win a Grammy?
entry.summary: Ghostwriter created "Heart on My Sleeve" with help from AI. It was pulled from streaming services, but it could it really win music's highest honor?

entry.title: Shaq Played Active Role in Solana NFT Project Before Abandoning It, Lawsuit Alleges
entry.summary: Basketball legend Shaquille O'Neal bailed after FTX's collapse, the amended complaint claims, allegedly tanking the NFT project's value.

entry.title: How Bitcoin Miners in Texas Are Making Millions Without Mining at All
entry.summary: Miners “either mine BTC or curtail energy when prices are high to sell it back to the grid,” Compass Mining told Decrypt, giving them a better return than mining.

entry.title: EA Sports UFC 5: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Are you ready to rumble? EA Sports UFC 5 will be the first Mature-rated entry in the MMA fighting series, coming to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S.

entry.title: Former FTX Exec Ryan Salame Forfeits $1.5 Billion in Plea Deal
entry.summary: Salame, co-CEO of FTX Digital Markets, pleaded guilty to campaign finance violations and fraud.

entry.title: How Mino Games is Using Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha McKinnon tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the studio's upcoming game Dimensionals will use real-time AI.

entry.title: INTERVIEW: How Will Aurory Use NFTs and Crypto?
entry.summary: Michael Natoli, Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Aurory games will use NFTs and crypto and shares the studio's broader stance on the tech.

entry.title: Google Cloud's James Tromans on the Intersection of AI and Web3
entry.summary: Google's Global Head of Google Cloud for Web3 James Tromans sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson to discuss how AI can help Web3 companies come to market faster and the real value of Web3 tools.

entry.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U
entry.summary: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams—and have fun while doing it!

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The future of AI Stardom and Robotics with SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.
